item.title: 特朗普称马斯克在印度建厂对美国不公平
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普在周二接受福克斯新闻采访时表示，如果特斯拉在印度建厂以规避该国的关税，那将对美国 "不公平"。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump has said that if Tesla were to build a factory in India to circumvent that country's tariffs, it would be "unfair" to the U.S., in an interview with Fox News which aired on Tuesday.】

item.title: 苹果发布首款定制调制解调器芯片，不再使用高通公司芯片
item.description: 苹果公司周三披露了其首款定制设计的调制解调器芯片，该芯片将帮助 iPhone 与无线数据网络连接，此举将使苹果公司减少对高通公司芯片的依赖，高通公司的芯片也为其安卓竞争对手提供动力。【原文：Apple on Wednesday revealed its first custom-designed modem chip that will help connect iPhones to wireless data networks, a move that will make the company less reliant on chips from Qualcomm that also power its Android rivals.】

item.title: 备忘录称，高盛任命内部人士康诺利和沃里斯为美洲 ECM 部门联席主管
item.description: 根据路透社周三看到的一份备忘录，高盛已任命内部人士威廉-康诺利（William Connolly）和迈克尔-沃里斯（Michael Voris）为美洲股票资本市场（ECM）联席主管。【原文：Goldman Sachs has appointed insiders William Connolly and Michael Voris as co-heads of Equity Capital Markets (ECM) in the Americas, according to a memo seen by Reuters on Wednesday.】

item.title: 小麦薄片购买者就标签问题与 Mondelez 达成和解
item.description: 小麦薄脆饼干的购买者达成了一项价值 1,000 万美元的诉讼和解协议，该诉讼指控 Mondelez International 公司欺骗性地将这种饼干标注为 "100% 全谷物"，尽管这种饼干含有玉米淀粉（一种精制谷物）。【原文：Wheat Thins purchasers reached a $10 million settlement of a lawsuit accusing Mondelez International of deceptively labeling the crackers as "100% Whole Grain" though they contained corn starch, a refined grain.】

item.title: 特朗普谈协议之际，俄罗斯在乌克兰关键矿产上取得进展
item.description: 与美国总统唐纳德-特朗普一样，俄罗斯也觊觎乌克兰的自然资源--在地面上，俄罗斯军队正在逼近一个巨大的锂矿床。【原文：Russia, like U.S. President Donald Trump, covets Ukraine's natural resources - and on the ground its forces are closing in on a giant lithium deposit.】

item.title: 达到超大平台地位后，WhatsApp 面临欧盟技术规则的挑战
item.description: Meta Platforms 旗下的 WhatsApp 公司表示，WhatsApp 已经达到了具有里程碑意义的欧盟技术规则中规定的用户标准，这意味着它必须采取更多措施来应对网络非法和有害内容。【原文：WhatsApp has hit a user criterion set out in landmark EU tech rules, the unit owned by Meta Platforms said, meaning it is required to do more to tackle online illegal and harmful content.】

item.title: 捷蓝航空仍在与多家航空公司商谈合作事宜
item.description: 捷蓝航空公司（JetBlue Airways）周三表示，该公司仍在与多家航空公司就建立合作伙伴关系进行谈判，并愿意划拨更多资金以达成交易。【原文：JetBlue Airways said on Wednesday that it is still in talks with multiple airlines to establish a partnership and is willing to allocate more funds to get a deal done.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，KKR 向英国泰晤士水务公司出价 50 亿美元收购多数股权
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周三援引知情人士的话报道，美国私募股权投资集团 KKR 已向英国泰晤士水务公司出价近 40 亿英镑（约合 50 亿美元），收购该公司的多数股权。【原文：U.S. private equity group KKR has offered nearly 4 billion pounds ($5 billion) to Britain's Thames Water for a majority stake in the utility, Bloomberg News reported on Wednesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 通用汽车首席财务官表示，如果美国关税成为永久性关税，公司必须考虑工厂选址问题
item.description: 通用汽车公司首席财务官保罗-雅各布森（Paul Jacobson）周三在巴克莱（Barclays）会议上表示，如果美国关税成为永久性关税，该公司将不得不考虑搬迁工厂，但他同时表示，该公司尚未做出这些决定。【原文：General Motors CFO Paul Jacobson said Wednesday at a Barclays conference that if U.S. tariffs became permanent, the company would have to consider moving plants, but also said it has not made those decisions yet.】

item.title: 欧洲业绩日股票波动为长期投资者壮胆
item.description: 欧洲公司股票在其收益日前后异常剧烈的波动，促使越来越多一贯谨慎的长期投资者在价格大幅波动时跃跃欲试。【原文：Unusually high volatility in the shares of European companies around their earnings days has prompted a growing number of typically cautious longer-term investors to jump on big price swings.】

item.title: 昵称在中国科技复兴中绽放光芒
item.description: 六小龙、七姐妹和恐怖十杰。这些都是中国土生土长的英雄们在与被称为 "七巨头 "的美国科技巨头对决时获得的绰号。【原文：Six Little Dragons, Seven Sisters and the Terrific Ten. These are some of the nicknames being bestowed on China's cast of home-grown heroes as they take on the U.S. tech goliaths, known as the Magnificent Seven.】

item.title: 墨西哥卷饼店将为 "卷饼季 "增聘 2 万名员工
item.description: Chipotle Mexican Grill 公司将在 3 月至 5 月期间增聘 2 万名员工，以应对春季 "卷饼季 "需求的激增。【原文：Chipotle Mexican Grill will hire 20,000 additional employees for the period of March to May as the company gears up to cater to a surge in demand for its so-called "burrito season" during spring.】

item.title: 芯片需求复苏，模拟器件公司第一季度收入超出预期
item.description: 受芯片需求，特别是消费类芯片需求复苏的推动，模拟器件公司周三公布的第一季度营收和利润超出华尔街预期，使其股价在盘前交易中上涨了 5%。【原文：Analog Devices topped first-quarter Wall Street expectations for revenue and profit on Wednesday, driven by a recovery in chip demand, particularly in the consumer segment, sending its shares up 5% in premarket trading.】

item.title: 中国部长向美国新任贸易部长表达对关税的不满
item.description: 中国商务部周三表示，中国商务部长王文涛在给新任美国商务部长霍华德-卢特尼克（Howard Lutnick）的信中表达了对美国对中国商品加征关税的强烈不满。【原文：Chinese Commerce Minister Wang Wentao has expressed strong dissatisfaction with U.S. tariffs on Chinese goods in a letter addressed to the newly confirmed U.S. Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick, the ministry said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 美国一月份独户住宅开工率下滑
item.description: 受暴风雪和低温天气的影响，1 月份美国独户住宅建筑业大幅下滑，进口关税导致的成本上升和抵押贷款利率的上升可能会限制其反弹。【原文：U.S. single-family homebuilding fell sharply in January amid disruptions from snowstorms and freezing temperatures, with a rebound likely to be limited by higher costs from tariffs on imports and elevated mortgage rates.】

item.title: 万事达卡标志性交易在英国集体诉讼资金测试中受到质疑
item.description: 本周三，万事达卡（Mastercard）就代表英国消费者提起的一起具有里程碑意义的诉讼达成的和解协议招致了批评，这场纠纷可能会阻碍出资人参与英国蓬勃发展的集体诉讼领域。【原文：Mastercard's agreement to settle a landmark lawsuit brought on behalf of British consumers drew criticism on Wednesday, in a dispute that could deter funders from involvement in Britain's burgeoning class action sector.】

item.title: 欧盟考虑对特朗普新关税实施更严格的钢铁进口限制
item.description: 欧盟委员会正在调查是否要收紧现行的钢铁进口配额制度，以保护欧盟生产商免受美国总统唐纳德-特朗普计划于3月12日对进口钢铁和铝征收的新关税的影响。【原文：The European Commission is investigating whether to tighten its current system of quotas on steel imports to protect EU producers from new tariffs U.S. President Donald Trump plans to impose on incoming steel and aluminium on March 12.】

item.title: 土耳其将向美国出口1.5万吨鸡蛋，应对禽流感干扰
item.description: 一位主要行业官员周三表示，土耳其已开始向美国出口约1.5万吨鸡蛋，美国正在爆发的禽流感疫情扰乱了供应，导致价格飙升，并引发了与其他生产商的谈判。【原文：Turkey has begun exporting around 15,000 tonnes of eggs to the United States, where an ongoing outbreak of bird flu disrupted supply, sent prices soaring and led to talks with other producers, a leading sector official said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 户外可穿戴设备需求强劲，Garmin 预测 2025 年业绩高于预期
item.description: 瑞士导航设备制造商 Garmin 周三预计全年业绩将高于华尔街预期，主要得益于其户外和汽车 OEM 业务的持续增长。【原文：Swiss navigation device maker Garmin forecast full-year results above Wall Street estimates on Wednesday, banking on continued momentum in its outdoor and auto OEM segments.】

item.title: 西南航空转型负责人瑞安-格林将卸任
item.description: 在西南航空公司与激进投资者埃利奥特投资管理公司（Elliott Investment Management）达成协议数月后，该公司周三表示，其首席转型官瑞安-格林（Ryan Green）将卸任。【原文：Southwest Airlines said on Wednesday its chief transformation officer, Ryan Green, will step down from his role, months after the carrier reached an agreement with activist investor Elliott Investment Management.】

item.title: 电动卡车制造商尼古拉申请破产保护
item.description: 尼古拉公司周三表示，该公司已申请破产保护，并将寻求出售全部或大部分资产，在过去几个季度中，该公司一直在努力解决现金快速消耗和融资困难的问题。【原文：Nikola said on Wednesday it had filed for Chapter 11 bankruptcy protection and would pursue a sale of all or most of its assets, after grappling with rapid cash burn and struggling to raise funds in the past few quarters.】

item.title: Etsy 节假日季度销售额不及预期，股价下跌
item.description: 受礼品和手工艺品消费疲软的影响，Etsy 的假日季度营收和商品销售总额均未达到华尔街预期，导致该在线市场股价在周三盘前交易中下跌 8%。【原文：Etsy missed Wall Street estimates for holiday-quarter revenue and gross merchandise sales, hurt by weak spending on gifts and handcrafted goods, sending shares of the online marketplace down 8% in premarket trading on Wednesday.】

item.title: Coach 母公司 Tapestry 将以 1.05 亿美元出售 Stuart Weitzman 鞋类品牌
item.description: Coach 母公司 Tapestry 周三表示，将以 1.05 亿美元现金将 Stuart Weitzman 品牌出售给 Dr Scholl's 鞋类所有者 Caleres。【原文：Coach parent Tapestry will sell the Stuart Weitzman brand to Dr Scholl's footwear owner Caleres for $105 million in cash, the companies said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 特朗普媒体、隆布尔起诉巴西最高法院法官
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的特朗普媒体& 科技集团（Trump Media & Technology Group）和视频共享平台 Rumble 周三起诉了巴西最高法院的一名法官，指控其进行非法审查。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump's Trump Media & Technology Group and video-sharing platform Rumble sued a Brazilian Supreme Court justice over accusations of illegal censorship on Wednesday.】

item.title: 独家报道：Vanguard 因新的 ESG 指南而暂停公司会议
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，顶级共同基金管理公司先锋（Vanguard）在审查美国证券交易委员会（U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission）关于投资者激进主义的新指导意见的影响时，暂停了与投资组合公司的会面。【原文：Top mutual fund manager Vanguard has paused meetings with portfolio companies while it reviews the impact of new guidance on investor activism from the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 苹果公司将推出成本更低的新款 iPhone，以占领更广阔的市场
item.description: 苹果公司将于本周三推出其最新的廉价版 iPhone 机型，以抢占中端智能手机市场的更大份额，并抵御三星和中国华为等竞争对手的竞争。【原文：Apple is set to launch its latest budget iPhone model on Wednesday as it looks to grab a bigger share of the mid-range smartphone market and fend off competition from rivals such Samsung and China's Huawei.】

item.title: 预测疲软预示约会应用转机缓慢，Bumble 股价下滑
item.description: Bumble公司的股价周三下跌了16%，因为这家约会应用运营商预计第一季度的营收低于市场预期，该公司仍在努力应对付费用户增长放缓的问题。【原文：Bumble's shares fell 16% on Wednesday after the dating app operator forecast first-quarter revenue below market estimates, as it continues to grapple with a slowdown in the growth of paying users.】

item.title: 苹果称英国监管机构对移动浏览器的补救方案将打击创新
item.description: 苹果公司告诉英国竞争监管机构，该监管机构为解决移动浏览器市场问题而提出的一些补救方案将影响这家 iPhone 制造商的创新动力。【原文：Apple has told Britain's competition regulator that some of the remedy options proposed by the watchdog to address concerns in the mobile browser market would impact the iPhone maker's incentive to innovate.】

item.title: 早间竞价落后的美国仍在徘徊新高
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】

item.title: 脂肪而非肌肉：制药商竞相寻求下一个减肥突破
item.description: 目前的减肥方法，如改变生活方式、手术以及诺和诺德公司的 Wegovy 和礼来公司的 Zepbound 等流行疗法，都会导致脂肪和肌肉流失，从而增加跌倒的风险并降低整体力量，这对老年患者尤其有害。【原文：Current weight-loss methods such as lifestyle changes, surgery, and popular therapies like Novo Nordisk's Wegovy and Eli Lilly's Zepbound result in both fat and muscle loss that can increase the risk of falls and decrease overall strength, which could be especially harmful for older patients.】
